subject: Re: [R] Filtering
body:
There are some examples here:

library(zoo)
?aggregate.zoo

and also in

vignette("zoo")


On 4/19/07, Soare Marcian-Alin  wrote:
> Hello Everybody,
>
> How can I filter a dataset?
>
> Im trying to filter the dataset EuStockMarkets monthly and quarter.
>
> data(EuStockMarkets)
> ftse = EuStockMarkets[,4]
>
> Alin
>
